transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, Supervision Marketing Private Limited.
Customer: Ji main bol raha hu yaha se.
Executive: Sir main Ankita baat kar rahi hu senior manager Indiamart team se. Maine aapko call kiya hai aaj aapka video meeting hua tha hamari team executive Prashant ke sath. Jisme sir aapne feedback diya hai ki aap satisfied nahi hai Indiamart ko lekar.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Jaan sakte hai ye feedback aapne kis wajah se diya sir kya pareshani aa rahi hai Indiamart ko lekar?
Customer: Indiamart me na lagbhag mujhe ho gaye chhe mahina aur chhe mahine ke andar me abhi tak koi achche sa deal nahi ho paya hai aur consume bhi kar raha hu logo se baat bhi kar raha hu lekin uske bavajud mujhe achcha lead nahi mil pa raha hai aur na hi achche se koi deal confirm complete ho pa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir deal convert hona bilkul hi matlab main samajh rahi hu ki agar business convert hoga tabhi wo useful hai but iske liye to kafi sare reason bhi hote hain jaise pricing aapka kya provide kar rahe ho market mein price kya hai aapne mujhe mention kiya ki aapko leads sahi nahi mil rahi hai matlab kis reason se lead wo sahi nahi lag rahi hai kya matlab lead mein issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Ek do ek do ek do wale quantity wala bhi yada aa raha hai jaise ki mere paas se PG aa rahe hain mere paas face wash hai to aise vyakti me lead aani chahiye lekin is type ki ek face wash do face wash aise wale lead aa rahi hai dusre din main filter bhi laga dekh raha hu to filter bhi lagane ke bavajud bhi waha pe achchi lead mujhe mil hi nahi raha dusra cheez koi lead aa rahi hai to dusre brand branding issue aa ja raha hai apne company district company ke branding mein to ye main issue aa rahe hain main cheez mujhe.
Executive: Aapka jaise product jo dala hai haan jaise potation humed aapne dal rakha hai face wash dal rakha hai to sir I hope matlab aapka ye main product herbal joint pain relief aur aapne iske kafi sare lead consume bhi kiye hai potation humed pe main dekh rahi hu 35 lead aapne liye face wash ki category mein 30 lead li hai ab is wajah se brand specific aa bhi raha hai usko aap apna brand suggest karenge na sir ki ha matlab aapke brand ka kyu usko useful hai price wise usko sahi lag raha hai to ye sari cheeze hain.
Customer: Main sare mention to kar raha hu lekin uske bavajud bhi pata nahi log convert hi nahi ho pate hain kaha samasya aa raha hai mere ko kuch samajh nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe bataye main kya help kar sakti hu aapki kyuki sir agar deal convert hone ki baat hai to aap best price aap provide karenge follow up karenge aap strong aur reh gayi cheeze agar aapki profile ki rating reviews achchi hai to aap aapki profile ki rating five chal rahi hai aap apne buyer ko aisa batate hain ki matlab aapki company ki rating five hai Indiamart pe aapko utna time ho gaya ye sari cheeze bata rahe hain aap?
Customer: Logoko itna knowledge hota hi nahi Indiamart ke bare mein bas insert kar lete hain.
Executive: Sir aaj aapka matlab google meet lead nahi mil pa raha hai main baat.
Customer: Sir aisa nahi hai jitni bhi leads aati hai Indiamart pe wo verified hi hai sir.
Customer: Mere paas jitna bhi lead aa rahi hai matlab jo main consume karta hu unme se maximum lead to aisi hi logo ne jo ja kar ke search ki hoti hai waise lead aati hai jisko main phone la ke bolta hu bhai ki tumne ye dala hua tha requirement ki isko kab tak aapko chahiye kya aise karke to waha pe usi time pe bhai maine kab dala tha maine aise dala hoga to aise hi dal diya tha to aise type ki lead aa raha hu to fir waha pe fir baat banti hai.
Executive: Pehli cheez jitni bhi lead post hoti hai na hamare paas wo lead verified hi hoti hai reh gayi baat se jaise koi buyer keh rahe hain ki humne ye lead nahi dala hai ya kuch bhi to sir aap aisa sochiye ki jab buyer ne apna number diya email id diya verify kiya tabhi wo lead bani na sir right follow up kijiye.
Customer: Iske liye na mujhe na ye follow up karne ke liye ek aisa aadmi do jo account ko manage kare logo se baat kare itna time logo se baat kare matlab ke liye logo se baat kare main matlab ki mujhe ek aise insan provide karwaiye yadi aap log provide kara sakte hain to ki jo lead consume karke achche logo se ho karke wo follow up follow up me baat kare right me mere paas aisa koi employee nahi hai.
Executive: Sir ye to aapke employee karenge na sir Indiamart ke employee kisi lead se baat nahi kar sakte sir humne aapko kabhi matlab Indiamart pe dete hain aapke aur buyer ke beech hum buyer se kaise baat kar sakte hain aisa kuch ho sakta hai main aapko ye puch raha hu main mujhe aisa kuch ho sakta hai mere paas right me employee nahi mil pa rahi mere ko hai na ab main sabhi kaam ko ek sath manage nahi kar sakta main bar bar ek insan ko 10 bar phone nahi laga sakta 12 bar phone nahi laga sakta next me ho sakta hai follow up me kami aa raha hoga mere do se teen bar hi call lagata hu logo ko aur main ek bar do bar response deta hu uske baad me dobara call nahi laga pata hu main.
Executive: Iske liye aap kya kijiye main batati hu main bata rahi hu sir jaise aapka office mein bahut sara staff hoga Indiamart pe bahut jyada time nahi dena hai din mein ek ghante bhi agar aap login karke aapne char panch lead dekha aap lead aap dekh lene ke baad aapko samajh mein aa jata hai ki do lead me baat karni hai lead se baat kiya aapne follow up ke liye quotation bheja sham mein ek follow up le liya ki subah quotation gaya tha price aapko sahi laga product ka aapko sample chahiye ki nahi ek follow up required hota hai theek hai Indiamart aap itna user friendly hai ki usme sare tarike likhe hue hain ki aapko reminder kaise set karna hai quotation bhejna kaise hai chat kaise karna hai to aap kisi bhi staff ko iske liye assign kijiye main aapko staff ko proper training dilwaungi ki services kaise use karni hai aur wo staff Indiamart pe 24 into seven nahi rahega ki usko 24 ghante wahi kaam karna hai usko apne pure kaam mein se ek ghante ka samay nikalna hai to aapke paas kya koi aisa staff hai jisko main training wagera dilwa sakti hu?
Customer: Main ek baat pata karta hu sir iske baad fir kaun hai iske baad me confirm karta hu main abhi to aapke office mein sir ye aapka main business hai na aapka business kya hai right?
Customer: Mera business MLM par aadharit hai hamara business mein staff ki jarurat nahi padta sara kaam hamara robotic hoti hai aur dusra sara kaam hamare distributor hai wo sambhal lete hain hum log office me baith ke karne ki jarurat padta hi nahi hai Indiamart ko maine additional liya hua tha kyuki yaha se link mil jayega mujhe to logo se baat kar lunga ghar pe lekin Indiamart apne liya hai main aapko ek cheez bata du Indiamart se aapka advertisement bhi kafi achcha hoga aur is platform se log bahut achcha business convert bhi kar rahe hain thodi si cheeze hain hum aapko sahi tarike se guide nahi kar pa rahe thodi cheeze hain ki aapko bhi samajhni hogi agar aap chahe to main aapko bhi proper jo bhi mera best possible ho sakta hai main aapko ek training facility dilwa sakti hu aap khud aap apne phone mein app download kijiye jaise sir aap man lijiye kahin drive bhi kar rahe hain drive karte ke samay aap car mein baithe hain aapko panch minute ka samay hai aapne app login kiya fir lagaya location ka filter ki mere near by mein kaun kaun si achchi lead hai aapne do minute baat kar liya koi buyer hai bol raha hai quotation bhej do bhej diya to ye sab cheeze main aapko bhi sikha sakti hu waise to aaj aapki google meeting hui thi account manager ne kuch guide kiya aapko kuch bataya service se related?
Customer: Ha account manager se problem maine bataya to unhone bole chalo service me kaam karta hu bola unhone lead me bhi kaam karne karta hu bola aur unko sara samasya main bata diya main samasya nikal kar aata hai branding me logo ko requirement aata hai dusre brand ka hamare paas hai koi hamari khud ki brand hai market brand me kaam karte hi hain to logo ko humko chahiye.
Executive: Sir ek cheez batao sir brand ka jo issue hai wo kaha nahi aata hai pehle ke time pe face wash ka ek ya do hi brand hota tha theek hai teesra brand koi market mein aata hi nahi tha pehle ke samay ki agar hum baat kare to agar aap koi food items nikal lijiye to food items ka ek hi do brand tha agar salt ki baat kare to pure pan India mein sirf tata salt hi jyadatar available hota tha but aaj ke time pe competition waha pe brand aaye hain dheere dheere unki marketing bani hai ab product bhi sale ho raha hai to sir ye issue to hamesha hi rahega hume to solution oriented banna hai na ki iska solution kya hai solution yahi hai ki agar aapka brand aap jo provide kar rahe ho ki quality achchi hai aur price bhi market trend ke hisab se sahi hai to buyer lega hi lega dusri cheez jaise maine aapko bataya agar aap apne profile ki rating pe work karte ho review pe work karte hain agar aapke profile pe 10 log rating dal ke gaye hain ki inse product humne liya hai wo rating achcha hai wo product achcha hai humne achcha review diya hai to buyer bhi aapke purchase karega yahi tarike se karne ki jarurat hai aap mujhe ye bataye sir ki aapka kal koi time free hai jis samay main aapse google meeting pe connect ho paau jyada nahi 15 se 20 minute ka samay lungi.
Customer: Kal 12 baje.
Executive: Kal 12 baje theek hai aap ye number save rakh sakte hain Ankita ke name se koi bhi issue aaye aap mujhe call kijiye kal main 12 baje connect hoti hu main bhi rahungi aapka account manager Prashant bhi rahega aap bhi rahenge main aapko app ke through sari cheeze guide karungi din ka ek ghanta dena padega aap start kijiye jyada samay nahi 10 15 minute subah mein 10 15 minute dopahar mein sham mein aur usko follow up bas karna hai lead ko kya sari cheeze buyer ko suggest karni hai sari cheeze hum batayenge aapko theek hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir abhi jo bhi
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting good leads on IndiaMART.

- Difficulty in converting leads into deals.

- Leads received are often low quantity or irrelevant.

- Branding issues with leads from other companies.

- Unable to manage follow-ups due to time constraints.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of profile ratings.

- Executive offered training on using IndiaMART effectively.

- Suggested assigning a staff member for IndiaMART tasks.

- Scheduled a Google Meeting to guide through the app.



Next Steps: 

- Google Meeting scheduled for the next day at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, training, follow up, branding
